clusters.title: At least 10 killed in Israeli strikes on Lebanon, state media says
clusters.neutral_headline: Israeli Strikes Kill At Least Ten People

items.title: At least 10 killed in Israeli strikes on Lebanon, state media says
items.standfirst: A senior Hezbollah official is among those reported killed in air strikes on the Bekaa Valley and southern Lebanon.
items.content: A senior Hezbollah official is among those reported killed in air strikes on the Bekaa Valley and southern Lebanon.

items.title: At least 10 killed in Israeli strikes in Lebanon’s Bekaa valley, health ministry says
items.standfirst: Hezbollah leader among dead as Israel says it hit militant command centresAt least 10 people have been killed and 24 wounded – including three children – in Israeli strikes in Lebanon’s eastern Bekaa valley, the Lebanese health ministry has said.Israel said it had hit “command centres” of the Lebanese militant group Hezbollah in the Bekaa valley. Two security sources told Reuters that senior Hezbollah leader Hussein Yaghi was killed in the attacks. Continue reading...
items.content: Hezbollah leader among dead as Israel says it hit militant command centresAt least 10 people have been killed and 24 wounded – including three children – in Israeli strikes in Lebanon’s eastern Bekaa valley, the Lebanese health ministry has said.Israel said it had hit “command centres” of the Lebanese militant group Hezbollah in the Bekaa valley. Two security sources told Reuters that senior Hezbollah leader Hussein Yaghi was killed in the attacks. Continue reading...

items.title: At least 12 killed in Israeli strikes on Lebanon - including senior Hezbollah official
items.standfirst: Israeli airstrikes have killed at least 10 people in Lebanon's Bekaa Valley and another two people in a Palestinian refugee camp, the Lebanese Health Ministry has said.
items.content: Israeli airstrikes have killed at least 10 people in Lebanon's Bekaa Valley and another two people in a Palestinian refugee camp, the Lebanese Health Ministry has said.

items.title: Israeli attacks kill at least 12 people, injure dozens across Lebanon
items.standfirst: Lebanese media said Israel targeted Ein el-Hilweh refugee camp in southern Lebanon and a building in the country's east.
items.content: Lebanese media said Israel targeted Ein el-Hilweh refugee camp in southern Lebanon and a building in the country's east.

ai_summary: At least 10 people killed in Israeli strikes on Lebanon
Strikes hit Bekaa Valley and southern Lebanon
Senior Hezbollah official among those reported killed
Israel says it hit militant command centers
Lebanese health ministry reports 24 wounded

clusters.title: NASA eyes March 6 to launch 4 astronauts to the moon on Artemis II mission
clusters.neutral_headline: NASA Targets March Launch For Artemis II Mission

items.title: NASA eyes March 6 to launch 4 astronauts to the moon on Artemis II mission
items.standfirst: The four astronauts heading to the moon for the lunar fly-by are the first humans to venture there since 1972. The ten-day mission will travel more than 600,000 miles.
items.content: The four astronauts heading to the moon for the lunar fly-by are the first humans to venture there since 1972. The ten-day mission will travel more than 600,000 miles.(Image credit: Miguel J. Rodriguez Carrillo)

items.title: Nasa targets early March to send humans back around the Moon
items.standfirst: Nasa sets the launch date following a successful "wet dress rehearsal" of the Artemis II mission.
items.content: Nasa sets the launch date following a successful "wet dress rehearsal" of the Artemis II mission.

items.title: First human mission to the moon in 50 years set to blast off next month
items.standfirst: NASA is planning to send astronauts to the moon next month for the first time in more than half a century.
items.content: NASA is planning to send astronauts to the moon next month for the first time in more than half a century.

items.title: NASA Sets March 6 as New Launch Target for Artemis Moon Mission
items.standfirst: NASA is targeting March 6 to launch the Artemis II astronauts to the vicinity of the moon for the first time since 1972.
items.content: NASA is targeting March 6 to launch the Artemis II astronauts to the vicinity of the moon for the first time since 1972.

ai_summary: NASA sets March 6 launch date for Artemis II mission
Four astronauts to travel to the moon on lunar flyby
Mission will travel over 600,000 miles in ten days
First human mission to the moon in over 50 years
NASA conducted successful wet dress rehearsal

Continue reading...

items.title: Why did the U.S. strike an alleged drug boat? #world
items.standfirst: U.S. forces targeted a vessel accused of drug trafficking U.S. military forces launched a strike in the eastern Pacific against a vessel the government described as involved in illicit drug smuggling. Officials reported the action killed three people aboard. The strike is the latest in a series of…

Officials reported the action killed three people aboard. The strike is the latest in a series of…

items.title: US military strike kills three in second alleged drug boat attack this week
items.standfirst: Move brings total number of people killed in US strikes on suspected boats since September to at least 148The US military launched a strike on an alleged drug smuggling boat in the eastern Pacific on Friday, killing three men in its second strike this week.“Intelligence confirmed the vessel was transiting along known narco-trafficking routes in the Eastern Pacific and was engaged in narco-trafficking operations,” US Southern Command, which oversees operations in Latin America and the Caribbean, said on Twitter/X. Continue reading...
items.content: Move brings total number of people killed in US strikes on suspected boats since September to at least 148The US military launched a strike on an alleged drug smuggling boat in the eastern Pacific on Friday, killing three men in its second strike this week.“Intelligence confirmed the vessel was transiting along known narco-trafficking routes in the Eastern Pacific and was engaged in narco-trafficking operations,” US Southern Command, which oversees operations in Latin America and the Caribbean, said on Twitter/X. Continue reading...

items.title: US military says it attacked vessel in Pacific Ocean, killing three people
items.standfirst: US military's Southern Command (SOUTHCOM) claimed the vessel was involved in drug trafficking, without providing proof.
items.content: US military's Southern Command (SOUTHCOM) claimed the vessel was involved in drug trafficking, without providing proof.

ai_summary: US military launches strike on alleged drug boat

clusters.title: Asos co-founder dies in fall from 18-storey building in Thailand
clusters.neutral_headline: Asos Co Founder Dies In Thailand

items.title: Asos co-founder dies in fall from 18-storey building in Thailand
items.standfirst: Police say UK entrepreneur Quentin Griffiths fell from 17th floor of an 18-floor condominium on 9 FebruaryQuentin Griffiths, the co-founder of the online fashion retailer Asos, has died after falling from an apartment building in the Thai seaside resort city of Pattaya.Police told Reuters that the 58-year-old had fallen from the 17th floor of an 18-storey condominium on 9 February. Continue reading...
items.content: Police say UK entrepreneur Quentin Griffiths fell from 17th floor of an 18-floor condominium on 9 FebruaryQuentin Griffiths, the co-founder of the online fashion retailer Asos, has died after falling from an apartment building in the Thai seaside resort city of Pattaya.Police told Reuters that the 58-year-old had fallen from the 17th floor of an 18-storey condominium on 9 February. clusters.title: Anna Murdoch-Mann, writer and former News Corp director, dies aged 81

items.title: Anna Murdoch-Mann, writer and former News Corp director, dies aged 81
items.standfirst: The author, journalist and philanthropist died at home in Florida, according to Rupert Murdoch's news outlets.
items.content: The author, journalist and philanthropist died at home in Florida, according to Rupert Murdoch's news outlets.

items.title: Tactical, influential and mad about Rupert: Anna Murdoch-Mann remembered after her death aged 81
items.standfirst: Philanthropist and mother of Elisabeth, James and Lachlan Murdoch died at home in Palm Beach, FloridaThe author and philanthropist Anna Murdoch-Mann, the ex-wife of the Australian media tycoon Rupert Murdoch, died at her home in Palm Beach, Florida, on Tuesday. She was 81.Murdoch-Mann’s death was reported Friday by the New York Post, one of her ex-husband’s media properties. Continue reading...
items.content: Philanthropist and mother of Elisabeth, James and Lachlan Murdoch died at home in Palm Beach, FloridaThe author and philanthropist Anna Murdoch-Mann, the ex-wife of the Australian media tycoon Rupert Murdoch, died at her home in Palm Beach, Florida, on Tuesday. She was 81.Murdoch-Mann’s death was reported Friday by the New York Post, one of her ex-husband’s media properties. Continue reading...

clusters.title: U.S. men's hockey team crushes Slovakia, will face Canada in gold medal game
clusters.neutral_headline: US Mens Hockey Team Reaches Gold Medal Game

items.title: U.S. men's hockey team crushes Slovakia, will face Canada in gold medal game
items.standfirst: The U.S. men's hockey team will face Canada on Sunday for the gold medal. The U.S. men have not won gold in the Olympics since the "Miracle on Ice" team in 1980.
items.content: The U.S. men's hockey team will face Canada on Sunday for the gold medal. The U.S. men have not won gold in the Olympics since the "Miracle on Ice" team in 1980.

items.title: After dominant 6-2 win, the U.S. will face Canada for Olympic men's hockey gold
items.standfirst: In the semifinal, Slovakia had few answers for the American onslaught. Now, the U.S. men will meet Canada for a chance to win the team's first Olympic hockey gold since the "Miracle on Ice" back in 1980.
items.content: In the semifinal, Slovakia had few answers for the American onslaught. Now, the U.S. men will meet Canada for a chance to win the team's first Olympic hockey gold since the "Miracle on Ice" back in 1980.(Image credit: JULIEN DE ROSA)

ai_summary: US mens hockey team defeats Slovakia
Will face Canada in gold medal game
US has not won gold since 1980 Olympics
Team won 6-2 in semifinal match
Canada awaits in final match
